Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: காலத்தி னாற்செய்த நன்றி சிறிதெனினும்ஞாலத்தின் மாணப் பெரிது.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A favour conferred in the time of need, though it be small (in itself), is (in value) much larger than the world.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is in a moment of desperate need—perhaps dying of thirst in a desert. Another person offers them a single, tiny drop of water ('சிறிதெனினும்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The moment the drop is given, it is shown in a metaphysical sense to be larger and heavier than the entire world ('ஞாலத்தின் மாணப் பெரிது').
Layered_Composition.Background: A cosmic backdrop where the planet Earth is shown, looking small and insignificant compared to the immense, glowing representation of that single drop of timely help.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A small act of help, when done at the perfect time of need, transcends its physical size and becomes greater in value than the entire world.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The scale is the key: the physical drop is tiny, but its symbolic representation is colossal. The background comparison with the small Earth drives the point home visually.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The single drop of water glows with an intense, life-giving light that illuminates the entire scene. The rest of the desert is harsh and dark, while the planet Earth in the background is a beautiful but distant and small object.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dramatic shot that uses forced perspective or symbolic representation to show the tiny drop as larger than the distant planet.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a sharp focus on the glowing drop of water.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The drop is the primary, radiant light source.

Cultural_Anchors: Greater than the world (ஞாலத்தின் மாணப் பெரிது)
